sen.j: 財団法人益富地学会館（ざいだんほうじんますとみちがくかいかん）は、京都市上京区にある財団法人。
sen.e: Masutomi Geology Museum is a foundation located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Masutomi Geology Museum is a foundation located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 石に関する博物館を運営している。
sen.e: It operates a museum of stones

sen.j: 1973年（昭和48年） 日本地学研究会館として発足
sen.e: In 1973, it was inaugurated as Japan Geologic Study Hall.
In 1973, it was inaugurated as Japan Geologic Study Hall.
In 1973, it was inaugurated as Japan Geologic Study Hall.

sen.j: 1991年（平成3年） 財団法人となり、益富地学会館と改称
sen.e: In 1991, the hall became a foundation and its name was changed to Masutomi Geology Museum.
In 1991, the hall became a foundation and its name was changed to Masutomi Geology Museum.

sen.j: 主な事業 石に関する博物館（石ふしぎ博物館）の運営など
sen.e: Major buseineses: the operation of a museum of stones (The Wonder Stone Museum)
